original_text: The believers here say ‘hello’ to you. They are the children of your sister that God has chosen.
korean_text: 택하심을 받은 네 자매의 자녀들이 네게 문안하느니라

sentences.original_text: The believers here say 'hello' to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 여기에 있는 믿는 사람들이 당신에게 인사합니다.

sentences.original_text: They are the children of your sister
